duties_responsibilities.duty: Receive and fulfill drink orders by mixing and serving alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages following standard recipes and company proportions.
Serve alcohol beverages responsibly, request identification, and adhere to all unit and company alcohol service policies and procedures.
Enter drink orders into the cash register, collect payment, and make correct change.
Maintain bar stock by ordering or requisitioning liquors, beverages, condiments, and supplies.
Clean and store bar equipment and bar stock.
Perform opening, closing, and side work duties as assigned.
Provide customer service and create an excellent guest experience at all times.
